name: Hot Solder UK
tag_list: arduino, liquidware, robots, blinkm, crossworks, coolcomponents, sparkfun
overview:
Based in Exeter (UK), Hot Solder UK Ltd specialises in providing both design and development services of the highest quality to clients around the world. Hot Solder have extensive experience within major market sectors including telecoms, aerospace, defence and marine. Hot Solder’s main focus areas are low power embedded systems, short range wireless communications, and high end audio systems. In addition a number of interesting and useful modules are available in the online store for professional and enthusiastic engineers alike.

The company develops a comprehensive range of modular solutions, including low power embedded systems. Short range wireless communications, and high end audio products, the products are often designed for specific client needs and can be tailored to any specification. The products are available in the online store, or by contacting with your requirements.

The business aims to supply clients with a professional turn key solution and has a proven track record of doing just that. The expert personnel ensure clients deliver products to market on time.
